## Introduction
This vignette demonstrates how to explore the datasets and run the interactive Shiny dashboard provided in the Bushfire Data Explorer package.
```{r}
library(bushfiredataexplorer)
```

## Explore the Data
The package includes two datasets:

- a1_media – Communication styles across articles and media types

- a2_bushfire – Historical bushfire metrics (FWI, TX7x, Rain_mm)

```{r}
head(a2_bushfire)
summary(a2_bushfire)

```

## Launch the Interactive Dashboard
We can explore both datasets using the built-in Shiny app.
